articles.author: The Race Team
articles.title: Winners and losers from F1's 2024 Bahrain Grand Prix - The Race
articles.description: Max Verstappen and Red Bull were so dominant in the Bahrain Grand Prix it was tempting to make him the only winner in our usual rundown of the stars and flops. We didn’t quite go that far, but the list of disappointments is pretty big .
articles.content:
Max Verstappen and Red Bull breezed into the 2024 Formula 1 season in the same crushingly dominant spirit they've been in since mid-2022.
So dominant in the Bahrain Grand Prix, in fact, it was almos… [+6699 chars]
